translations.home.hero.description: We are a family-run breeder specializing in French Bulldogs of quality. Our puppies are raised with love and attention to become your loyal companions.
translations.home.hero.additionalInfo: Each puppy is from parents selected for their health, temperament, and conformity to the breed standards. We do everything we can to offer you healthy and well-socialized puppies.
translations.home.puppies.title: Our latest puppies
translations.home.whyUs.title: Why choose us?
translations.home.whyUs.qualityDescription: Our puppies are from parents selected for their health and conformity to the breed standards.
translations.home.whyUs.followUpDescription: All our puppies are vaccinated and identified.
translations.home.whyUs.familyDescription: Our puppies are raised in a family environment, which promotes their socialization and balance.
translations.home.testimonials.title: What our clients say
translations.home.contact.title: Contact us
translations.home.contact.description: Have any questions about our puppies or want to schedule a visit? Feel free to contact us, we'll be happy to answer your questions.

translations.home.testimonials.1.name: Client 1
translations.home.testimonials.1.description: Our French Bulldog is wonderful! We are happy to have adopted it from Frenchie Pour Toi. Thank you for your professionalism and kindness.

translations.footer.description: Quality French Bulldog breeder. Our puppies are raised with love and attention to become your loyal companions.
